narrative: Merged main branch into work to align timeline with latest updates. Resolved conflicts in AGENTS guidelines, timeline notes, and narrative map. Retrieved CodexRecap memories to ensure continuity and staged deletion of obsolete market analysis script.
user_input: merge the main in this branch and upgrade the timeline
